TheGame

Class CuarentaGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • TheGame.CuarentaGame

  • public class CuarentaGame
extends java.lang.Object
    The game itself consists of two players (human and computer), a deck of cards, and a table for holding played cards. Players can play cards to table, and take them. No rules or logic regarding gameplay is defined here
